revision.text:
{{Infobox military unit |unit_name= 116th Regiment Indiana Infantry |image= |dates= August 17, 1863 to March 2, 1864 |country= [[United States]] |allegiance= [[Union (American Civil War)|Union]] |branch= [[Infantry]] |equipment= |battles=[[Battle of Blue Springs]]
Battle of Walker's Ford }} The '''116th Regiment Indiana Infantry''' was an [[infantry]] [[regiment]] that served in the [[Union Army]] during the [[American Civil War]]. ==Service== The 116th Indiana Infantry was organized at [[Lafayette, Indiana|Lafayette]], [[Indiana]] for a six-month enlistment and mustered in August 17, 1863 under the command of [[Colonel (United States)|Colonel]] William C. Kise. The regiment was attached to Mahan's 1st Brigade, Wilcox's Left Wing Forces, [[Department of the Ohio]], to October 1863. 2nd Brigade, Wilcox's Division, Left Wing Forces, Department of the Ohio, to January 1864. District of the Clinch, Department of the Ohio, to February 1864. The 116th Indiana Infantry mustered out of service February 29 to March 2, 1864. ==Detailed service== Moved to Dearborn, Mich., August 31, and guarded the arsenal there until September 16. Moved to Nicholasville, Ky., September 16. Marched from Nicholasville, Ky., to Cumberland Gap September 24-October 3, 1863, and to Morristown October 6–8. Action at Blue Springs October 10. Marched to Greenville and duty there until November 6; then marched to Bull's Gap and across Clinch Mountain to Clinch River November–December. Action at Walker's Ford, Clinch River, December 2. Duty at Tazewell, Maynardsville, and in eastern Tennessee until February 1864. Action at Tazewell January 24. ==Casualties== The regiment lost a total of 65 men during service; 1 enlisted men killed, 64 enlisted men died of disease. ==Commanders== * Colonel William C. Kise ==See also== {{portal|American Civil War|Indiana}} * [[List of Indiana Civil War regiments]] * [[Indiana in the Civil War]] ==References== * Dyer, Frederick H. ''A Compendium of the War of the Rebellion'' (Des Moines, IA: Dyer Pub. Co.), 1908. * King, Andrew W. ''A Partial History of the Old Persimmon Brigade and Also the 116th Regt., Ind. Vols.'' (S.l.: s.n.), n.d. ;Attribution * {{CWR}} {{Indiana in the Civil War}} [[Category:Military units and formations established in 1863]] [[Category:Military units and formations disestablished in 1864]] [[Category:Indiana Civil War regiments]] [[Category:1863 establishments in Indiana]]
